content: Hello, I'm interested in buying the new iPhone 14. Can you provide me with some information?
Of course! The iPhone 14 is our latest model, and it comes in two versions: standard and Pro. Which one are you interested in?
I'd like to know more about both versions. What are the key differences between the standard and Pro?

The standard iPhone 14 has a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, while the Pro version has a 6.7-inch ProMotion XDR display with a higher refresh rate. The Pro also has additional camera features and more advanced materials.
Interesting. What about the camera capabilities? I'm into photography.

The Pro model offers a triple-lens camera system with advanced features like Night mode, ProRAW, and ProRes video recording. The standard version has a dual-lens camera but still delivers excellent photo quality.
Sounds good! Can you tell me about the storage options available for both models?
Certainly. The iPhone 14 standard comes in 128GB and 256GB storage options, while the Pro model offers 256GB and 512GB variants. It's worth considering your storage needs.
I think I'd go for the standard version with 256GB. How much does it cost?
The 256GB standard iPhone 14 is priced at $999. Do you have any specific color preferences?
I like the Graphite color. Do you have any ongoing promotions or trade-in options?

We have a trade-in program where you can get a discount for your old device. I can check its value if you provide me with the details. Additionally, we have financing options available for your purchase.
That's great! I have an iPhone 12 Pro. Can you tell me its trade-in value?
Sure, let me check that for you. Please give me a moment.
Take your time.
Thank you for waiting. Your iPhone 12 Pro qualifies for a $300 trade-in value towards the purchase of the iPhone 14.
That's good to know. I'd like to proceed with the purchase. Can you help me with the financing options?
Certainly! We offer both monthly installment plans and 0% interest financing. Which one would you prefer?
I prefer the 0% interest financing. How does that work?
With 0% interest financing, you can spread the cost of the iPhone 14 over 12 months without paying any interest. I can assist you in filling out the application.
Sounds good. Let's go ahead with the 0% interest financing.
Great choice! Let's start the application process. Can I have your name and contact information, please?
